entry.source: 〉 There is no relic reading right now...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Nao ha reliquias sendo detectadas agora...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,76035}I'm detecting a demon's Domain.{F801}Do you want to go on?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,76035}Estou detectando o dominio de um{F801}demonio. Voce quer continuar?{F801}
